items.sentence: Do you really want to raise these children by yourself?
Do you remember how good Tom was at playing the guitar?
Tom doesn\'t like people who smoke in no smoking areas.
Tom has three daughters. All three of them are married.
How did you find out that Tom was the one who did that?
How do you balance being a mother, a wife and a lawyer?
I didn\'t know that you were such superstitious people.
Do you really think that I\'m going to let you do that?
I\'m worried about what\'ll happen if Tom doesn\'t win.
Tom hasn\'t been doing what he\'s supposed to be doing.
